item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Thali- Regional Cuisine of India

Thali is one of New Haven's most celebrated restaurants and has some of the best Indian food in the Elm City. It's truly super YUM!!!!

Manager Mohammed will be offering a few drink specials which will be announced soon.

***
08/06/2010-UPDATE
Mohammed called me today to say he's making the NHC a surprise cocktail
Please expect most cocktail drinks to cost in the $8-$9 range

Also-they are planning for a minimum of 30 people for their free (and super yummy)appetizers, if you think you can make it, please RSVP
Thanks bunches!

***


In addition, there will be a small selection of Thali's food for us to sample throughout the evening.


Contact info:
Robyn-Allise
203-823-5302

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Thali (on Orange Street)
